snippet: HANSEN--Marilyn Sjogren Hansen, on March 21, 2016. Beloved mother of Carla and Ava Hansen of Manhattan, sister of Doris Sjogren Rowe. Magazine editor, author and party hostess. We already miss your vibrant laugh. You were so much fun. Bye, Mom. Love, Carla and Ava 1/3
lead_paragraph: HANSEN--Marilyn Sjogren Hansen, on March 21, 2016. Beloved mother of Carla and Ava Hansen of Manhattan, sister of Doris Sjogren Rowe. Magazine editor, author and party hostess. We already miss your vibrant laugh. You were so much fun. Bye, Mom. Love, Carla and Ava 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  HANSEN, MARILYN SJOGREN HANSEN
